title: BBC Sport
maintext:
Celtic midfielder Rocco Vata has been snapped up by high-profile football agency CAA Base, with the 18-year-old joining some of the biggest names in world football on its books. (Daily Record), external
Former Celtic winger Jota insists he will need time to adjust and get used to switching from Scottish football to Saudi Arabia after the 24-year-old's summer transfer to Al-Ittihad. (The Herald), external
